name: Erin Fantasy
description:
Erin Fantasy is a top-down shooter with retro 16 bits graphics, created by one single developer, although also making use of other Game Assets, .

Credits are due to:

  • Danki Code for the programming lessons I based it upon.
  • Contains music ©2021 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io). Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International
  • Contains music by Tim Beek (https://timbeek.itch.io/free-retro-boss-music)
  • SFX by kronbits (https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx)
  • Contains a character from a spritesheet maintained by route1rodent. (https://route1rodent.itch.io/16x16-rpg-character-sprite-sheet). 
  • Me, Wild Yoshi, for creating it.
  • You, dear player, for having fun with it, as otherwise it would be just another unfinished project.

This is only an early release, and development is still ongoing. It is by no means my full project. This demo version has only 2 enemy types and one boss at the end. You can expect many more maps, more enemy variety each with their own behaviour, locations, equipments, guns, and even whole systems as development progresses.

Controls are:

WASD or arrow keys for movement.

Mouse for aiming and shooting.

R for reloading.

Spacebar for jumping (requires you to have the special boots)

Q quicksaves at any time. Only your current level, health and score are saved. Ammo and equipment must be found throughout each level. You can load this quicksave through the corresponding menu option.

P or Esc keys for Pause menu.

Enter confirms options in the menu. 

You may notice that the shots don't always go exactly towards where your mouse is pointing. This is intended, as future updates will add ways for the player to improve their stats in accuracy system, as well as other RPGesque elements.

This is version 0.1. Updates on a weekly basis. If you like the game, consider donating. All funds received go towards the development, improvement and bugfixes. Every bit helps. I'm also open to feedback, tell me what you think about the game. Thank you!
